bug.summary: OpenCV 3.2 build fails - stitching module can't find cudawarping.hpp
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h5>System information (version)</denchmark-h>
OpenCV => 3.2 Operating System / Platform => Win 7 x64 Compiler => VS 2013
<denchmark-h:h5>Detailed description</denchmark-h>
The opencv_stitching project fails to build because it cannot find cudawarping.hpp. The include path for cudawarping is missing from the project settings. Adding opencv_cudawarping to the list of optional modules in CMakeLists.txt for the stitching module seemed to fix it but I'm relatively new at this so I don't know if there could be other ramifications for modifying that file. <denchmark-h:h5>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
